serviceHighlights: Cool roofing systems to reduce energy costs

areas.name: Fort Worth
areas.description: {{businessName}} serves Fort Worth homeowners and businesses with expert roofing repair and replacement, from the Cultural District to the outer suburbs.
areas.localChallenges: Fort Worth experiences some of the harshest wind events in North Texas, with straight-line winds and tornadoes peeling back shingles and flashing regularly. The intense West Texas sun bakes roofing materials faster than the national average, shortening roof lifespans without proper ventilation.

areas.name: Plano
areas.description: Serving Plano's established neighborhoods and newer developments with top-quality roofing work that meets the high standards of one of Texas's most sought-after communities.
areas.localChallenges: Plano's mature tree canopy, while beautiful, means roofs regularly take impact from falling limbs during storms. Hail damage is common in spring, and the high rate of home sales means many buyers discover aging or damaged roofs only after purchase.
serviceHighlights: Shingle, tile, and flat roof expertise

areas.name: Frisco
areas.description: {{businessName}} serves Frisco's fast-growing master-planned communities and newer construction homes, providing quality roofing that protects long-term investments.
areas.localChallenges: Frisco's rapid growth means many homes are built with builder-grade roofing materials that wear out faster than premium alternatives. Spring hail storms routinely sweep through Collin County, and newly built roofs without full break-in weatherproofing are especially vulnerable.

areas.name: McKinney
areas.description: From McKinney's historic downtown district to its newer master-planned suburbs, {{businessName}} delivers reliable roofing repair and replacement for every home style.
areas.localChallenges: McKinney's older historic district homes often have aging roofs with outdated materials that no longer meet modern energy or wind codes. Newer subdivisions in the outer ring regularly deal with spring hail and the thermal expansion stress that Texas summers put on roofing systems.
serviceHighlights: Storm damage repair with insurance coordination

areas.name: Arlington
areas.description: Serving Arlington's diverse mix of established neighborhoods and growing communities with dependable roofing services for homes, commercial buildings, and HOA communities.
areas.localChallenges: Arlington sits in the heart of the DFW storm belt, making it one of the most hail-impacted cities in the region. The mix of older mid-century homes and newer construction means {{businessName}} regularly encounters everything from worn three-tab shingles to cracked clay tiles that need careful specialty repair.
